New stamps
    Pyongyang, September 22 (KCNA) -- The Ministry of Posts and Telecommunications has recently issued six-piece set containing  acalypha nispida burm, allamanda neriuolla, begonia xhiematis fotsch, fatsia Japonica eeche, streptocarous hybrida hort and streptocarbus rexii lindl -- the gift plants presented to President Kim Il Sung by the world's prominent persons and stamps describing Grifola Frondasa, Lactarius Volemus, Coriolus Versicolor, Aporocactus Flagelliformis, Astrophytum Ornatum and Gymnocalycium Michanovichii.

Gift to Kim Jong Il
      Pyongyang, September 22 (KCNA) - General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a gift from the visiting deputy leader Sumiko Shimizu of the Social Democratic Party of Japan.   Sumiko Shimizu handed the gift to secretary of the Central Committee of the Worker's Party of Korea Kim Yong Sun, who is also chairman of the Korean Asia-Pacific Peace Committee.
